basics.name: Hau Tran
basics.label: Frontend Developer
basics.summary: Hey, I am Hau Tran, a front-end developer passionate about web development. I enjoy creating things that live on the internet from start to finish and take great care in the experience, and code quality of the things I build. Outside of programming, I enjoy doing photography and traveling.

projects.name: Arc
projects.summary: An e-commerce marketplace web application where people come together to make, sell, buy, and collect unique items
projects.technologies: TypeScript, TanStack Query, Nuxt.js, Pinia, Tailwind CSS, Express.js, MongoDB

projects.name: Meepo
projects.summary: A free social networking site where people converse with each other in short messages
projects.technologies: TypeScript, TanStack Query, Vue, Tailwind CSS, Ruby on Rails, PostgreSQL, Redis

projects.name: Camille
projects.summary: A note-taking web application where you can think, write, and plan
projects.technologies: Next.js, TypeScript, Tanstack Query, Tailwind CSS, Zustand, MySQL, Stripe

highlights: Develop new user-facing features, build reusable code for future use, ensure the technical feasibility of UI/UX designs, and optimize applications for maximum speed and scalability.
Communicating with BA/PO to clarify the user requirements
Work closely with designers and back-end developers to ensure that the UI, features meet the requirements.
Maintained and debugged projects are released on the production environment.
